title: Amazon billionaire Jeff Bezos and girlfriend Lauren Sanchez enjoy a casual breakfast outing
text:
Multi-billionaires, they're just like the rest of us.

At least that's what Amazon mogul Jeff Bezos would have had you believe when he stepped out for a casual Thursday breakfast with his girlfriend Lauren Sanchez and her son on Thursday morning, looking every inch the average Joe - despite the outing coming just weeks after he was named as America's richest man.

The 55-year-old businessman, who is worth $114 billion according to Forbes, and his former news anchor partner Lauren, 49, looked relaxed and comfortable as they made their way to a cafe near Santa Monica pier, along with Lauren's 13-year-old son Evan.

Dress-down Thursday: Billionaire Jeff Bezos and his girlfriend Lauren Sanchez enjoyed a breakfast outing in Santa Monica with the former news anchor's 13-year-old son this week

Cool and casual: The Amazon mogul, 55, and his partner, 49, both looked incredibly casual for their breakfast date, with Lauren modeling trendy aviator-style specs

Keeping it cool: Jeff and Lauren's outing comes just a few weeks after he was once again named as America's richest man in Forbes 400 list

Mother-of-three Lauren was dressed down in a beige sweater with balloon sleeves, which she paired with some tight black jeans, and a pair of simple tan leather sandals.

She topped off her look with a funky pair of aviator-style spectacles, and a simple beaded bracelet on her wrist.

Her long brunette locks were pulled back in a messy ponytail at the back of her head, and she appeared to be makeup-free.

Lauren also went without a handbag, but carried her iPhone in one hand - as did her boyfriend Jeff, who, just like his girlfriend, opted for an incredibly casual outfit for the breakfast date.

The billionaire donned dark blue jeans and a white T-shirt, which he paired with some white leather sneakers. He also carried a navy blue windbreaker over his arm as they walked through the parking lot of Cora's Coffee Shoppe, which is just a stone's throw from Santa Monica Pier.

Specs appeal: Lauren appeared to go makeup-free for the early morning jaunt, accessorizing with some glasses, and a pair of diamond earrings

Talk to the hand! Both Jeff and Lauren carried iPhones with them as they strolled through the parking lot outside of Cora's Coffee Shoppe

Local spot: The cafe, which is located just a stone's throw from Santa Monica Pier, is said to offer patrons an 'intriguingly varied menu'

The casual eatery is described as having an 'intriguingly varied menu' that focuses on locally-sourced produce that is 'organic when possible'.

There are a wide variety of breakfast options on the menu, which was created by long-time restaurateur Chef Bruce Marder, with patrons given a choice of everything from heuvos rancheros and burrata caprese omelette to buckwheat blueberry pancakes and a Turkish-style breakfast.

Prices for the dishes range from $3.75 for a bagel to $18.50 for organic grass fed 'Vegas' steak and eggs with smashed potato.

None of which should be out of reach for Jeff, who was once again named as the wealthiest man in America in this year's Forbes 400 list, despite the fact that his $114 billion is actually $46 billion down from last year.

The Amazon founder narrowly beat number two on the list Bill Gates with $114 billion, down from his 2017 fortune of $160 billion.

Bargain! Cora's Coffee Shoppe's cheapest breakfast item is a $3.75 bagel, while the priciest is organic grass fed 'Vegas' steak and eggs with smashed potato for $18.50

Celebration: Despite losing $36 million from his fortune since 2017, Jeff still managed to top the list of America's wealthiest

Going strong: Lauren and Jeff's extramarital affair was revealed in January in the National Enquirer, one day after he announced his split from his ex-wife Mackenzie

A large chunk of that missing wealth now occupies the number 15 spot on the list, which is where his ex-wife Mackenzie Bezos makes her debut with $36.1 billion.

Jeff and Mackenzie went through a very public divorce in the spring, with the Amazon mogul's ex-wife walking away from their marriage with a hefty settlement that included $38 billion worth of Amazon stock.

That came just seven months after the illicit affair between Lauren and Jeff, who were both married when they began their romance, was exposed in the National Enquirer.

However Jeff and Lauren didn't let the public controversy stop them from enjoying a fun-filled summer together, with the pair jetting off on several exotic trips during the warmer months, including a stay on Diane von Furstenberg and Barry Diller's yacht in Venice in August.

Prior to that, the loved-up couple were hosted as guests of billionaire David Geffen aboard his $200 million yacht, enjoying a tour of some of Europe's most exotic locales alongside the music producer and a host of other high-profile guests, including the likes of model Karlie Kloss, Joshua Kushner, and music producer Scooter Braun.
description: The 55-year-old businessman, who is worth $114 billion, was pictured with his girlfriend, 49, and her son Evan Whitesell, 13, in Santa Monica on Thursday.
